Token.Abstract: The ImageRequestCache protocol extends the ImageCache protocol by adding methods for adding, removing and fetching images from a cache given an NSURLRequest and additional identifier.
Adds the image to the cache using an identifier created from the request and additional identifier.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The unique URL request identifing the image asset.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The additional identifier to apply to the URL request to identify the image.

Token.Abstract: Removes the image from the cache using an identifier created from the request and additional identifier.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The unique URL request identifing the image asset.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The additional identifier to apply to the URL request to identify the image.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A BOOL indicating whether or not all images were removed from the cache.

Token.Abstract: Returns the image from the cache associated with an identifier created from the request and additional identifier.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The unique URL request identifing the image asset.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The additional identifier to apply to the URL request to identify the image.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An image for the matching request and identifier, or nil.
